title: Attempt Invoking a Function
description: In this lab, we will learn about the `attempt` function in JavaScript. The `attempt` function allows us to invoke a function with the provided arguments and return either the result or an appropriate error object. We will explore the use of `try...catch` block to handle errors and create new `Error` objects if needed.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
